All Classes

Class Description
AliasScreen
Singleton class for showing the userinput dialog before starting the game.
AskAudienceBehavior
AskAudienceBehavior class implements a behavior from interface(LifeLineBehavior).
CallAFriendBehavior
Singleton class for call a friend lifeline.
ChangeQuestion
This class represent Change Question life line and it extends LifeLine class.
Controller
It represents the connection between Gui class and Game class.
DBConnection  
EndGameScreen
EndGameScreen is a VBox.
FINAL_GLOBAL_VARIABLES
This class is a container to all global variables and it's include other classes (nested classes).
This way used to make it easier to understand instead of sending unrelated value.
This class is used in different places of this application so make sure that you understand the purpose of this class before using it or editing a part of this application.
FINAL_GLOBAL_VARIABLES.LifeLineType
This class stores the name of the lifelines.
FINAL_GLOBAL_VARIABLES.OptionButtonState
It stores all possible option button states.
Every variable name describe the purpose of creating it.
FINAL_GLOBAL_VARIABLES.QuestionPart
It stores all possible question parts like the question text and its options (alternatives) and the order of the shown question.
Every variable name describe the purpose of creating it.
FINAL_GLOBAL_VARIABLES.SoundEffectName
This class stores the names of the different soundeffects.
Game
The main class of the Model package and it's represent the Model part of the MVC design pattern.
GetJson
This interface have methods that will handle getting a Json data from the server (game questions).
Gui
The main class of the View package and it's represent the View part of the MVC design pattern.
IntroScreen
It represnts IntroScreen (will be shown at application start).
LifeLine
This class represents life lines that can be used of a player
LifeLine
A class for creating the different lifelinesimages at the top of the screen and their view properties.
LifeLineArea  
LifeLineBehavior
This interface represents life line behavior and it is created to use strategy design pattern.
Main
Main method.
OptionButton
It represents options buttons.
Player  
PlayScreen
It represents the main playScreen (There will be shown a question with its alternatives).
PriceLabel
PriceLabel is a HBox and it have three private class variables (BalanceLabel,numberLabel and a circle) and two final static boolean variables.
PriceTable
PriceTable is a VBox.
Question
This class represents question object (question text and its alternatives etc).
QuestionArea
It represents question area there will be shown a question and its alternatives , timer and player's current balance.
RemoveHalfBehavior
This class represents remove half life line behavior.
SoundEffectPlayer
Abstract class for handling the sounds and its a part of the View.
TextLabel
It represnts text labels that will be shown underneath the non interactive texts like question text and balance text.
Timer
It represents timer and it is just an abstract class so it is like utility.
It kan be used wherever in the application.
TimerLabel
It represents TimerLabel there will be shown timer value (seconds).
